name: JLS Aviation and the Shannon School of Aeronautics
about: JLS Aviation and the Shannon School of Aeronautics, located at the historic Shannon Airport in Fredericksburg, Virginia, offers comprehensive flight training for various certifications, from sport pilot to commercial and beyond. Our well-maintained fleet of aircraft caters to a wide range of training needs, and our experienced instructors provide a professional and exciting learning environment. We are committed to making flight training accessible to students with diverse lifestyles and schedules. Discovery flights are available, starting at $185 for 30 minutes, providing a unique introductory experience. For more information, call us at (540) 374-1715 to begin your aviation journey.
services:
["Biennial Flight Review
Ground School
Instrument Proficiency Check
Intro Flight
Simulator
Commercial
Flight Instructor CFI
Flight Instructor Instrument CFII

Instrument"]
